latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: Potentially hazardous foods observed out of required temperature ranges during periods of storage or display at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Sewage lines observed not maintained at time of inspection Food prep drains observed directly connected to sewer at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Hand wash sink not provided in food prep area Hand wash sink observed not maintained at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
